
                            
                            <p><a href="https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/e757453a3a014e4db004487785265f6a" target="_blank">https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/e757453a3a014e4db004487785265f6a</a> <br>  <br> 随便找个人物照片，运行捷径第一张选择猪猪侠贴纸照片，第二张随便找个人的照片背身也行，手动调整下猪猪侠位置就完事 <br>  <br> 有更简便的方法也别叭叭，自己开一贴发去 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/132012eu2zdebzq2u8zpkl.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/132012eu2zdebzq2u8zpkl.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/132013cpozatgpyo9tg9zm.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/132013cpozatgpyo9tg9zm.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">我昨天没打卡 我今天进去 显示昨天打过了</p>
